game.name: GLUE BLOCKS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Glue falling blocks together to make even bigger blocks and clear massive lines for huge scores in wells of all shapes with dynamic gravity. Play solo, versus, or in chaotic co op, and build custom modes and wells with the editor.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Glue falling blocks together to make even bigger blocks and clear massive lines for huge scores in wells of all shapes with dynamic gravity. Play solo, versus, or in chaotic co op, and build custom modes and wells with the editor.
